"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const testing_1 = require("@nestjs/testing");
const service_1 = require("../../service");
const repository_1 = require("../../repository");
const library_1 = require("@prisma/client/runtime/library");
const mockProductRepository = {
    findAll: jest.fn(),
    findById: jest.fn(),
    create: jest.fn(),
    update: jest.fn(),
};
describe('ProductService', () => {
    let service;
    let repository;
    beforeEach(async () => {
        const module = await testing_1.Test.createTestingModule({
            providers: [
                service_1.ProductService,
                {
                    provide: repository_1.ProductRepository,
                    useValue: mockProductRepository,
                },
            ],
        }).compile();
        service = module.get(service_1.ProductService);
        repository = module.get(repository_1.ProductRepository);
        jest.clearAllMocks();
    });
    it('should be defined', () => {
        expect(service).toBeDefined();
    });
    describe('getAllProducts', () => {
        it('should return an array of products', async () => {
            const mockProducts = [
                {
                    id: 'b8e1a7c2-4f3b-4e2d-9a1e-2c3d4e5f6a7b',
                    name: 'Product 1 Name',
                    description: 'Product 1 Description',
                    price: new library_1.Decimal(10.0),
                    stock: 100,
                    imageUrl: 'http://example.com/product1.jpg',
                    created_at: new Date(),
                    updated_at: new Date(),
                    deleted_at: null,
                },
                {
                    id: 'c9f2b8d3-5e4c-6f7a-8b9c-0d1e2f3a4b5c',
                    name: 'Product 2 Name',
                    description: 'Product 2 Description',
                    price: new library_1.Decimal(20.0),
                    stock: 50,
                    imageUrl: 'http://example.com/product2.jpg',
                    created_at: new Date(),
                    updated_at: new Date(),
                    deleted_at: null,
                },
            ];
            mockProductRepository.findAll.mockResolvedValue(mockProducts);
            const result = await service.getAllProducts();
            expect(result).toEqual(mockProducts);
            expect(mockProductRepository.findAll).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1);
        });
    });
});
